# Load packages 
```{r}
if(!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(
  tidyverse,
  haven,
  dplyr,
  lubridate,
  readr,
  data.table,
  ggplot2,
  systemfit,
  summarytools
)
options(scipen=999)
```

store_choice<- read_sav("data/StoreChoices.sav")
